enhanced_by.reason: The sentence method relies on the word method to generate individual words for the sentence.
The words method can be used to generate a list of words, which can be useful for testing the sentence method with different word counts.
The paragraph method uses the sentence method internally, so testing the sentence method might require setting up a paragraph context.
The fixedString method uses the sentence method internally, so testing the sentence method might require setting up a fixed string context.
